articles.title: Asian shares up on China gains but tech worries weigh - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares rose on Tuesday, led by a stronger Chinese opening and shaking off the initial drag from tech-driven Wall Street losses, while the dollar stayed at multiweek lows against other major currencies.

articles.title: i12 Katong mall to reopen later this year with new tenants like Climb Asia and PS Cafe - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: The i12 Katong mall will reopen in the fourth quarter of this year after closing its doors for renovation in early 2020, said its operator Keppel Land on Tuesday (Apr 20).
articles.content:

articles.author: Melissa Stewart
articles.title: 19-year-old Singapore tech entrepreneur named in Forbes' 30 Under 30 Asia list - CNA
articles.description: 19-year-old Harsh Dalal is the co-founder and CEO of software company Team Labs. A total of 30 Singapore-based entrepreneurs, leaders and trailblazers made the list.

articles.title: MAHB plans RM1.3bil investment to transform Subang Airport - The Star Online
articles.description: SEPANG: Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd (MAHB) is eyeing a total investment of RM1.3bil for Subang Airport’s regeneration development (SZB) that will transform it from an airport operator to an ecosystem master developer and aviation hub in the Asia-Pacific.
